name: Brick-Force
description: Brick-Force is a sandbox shooter that lets you BUILD your own battlefields, SHARE them with other players, and PLAY many challenging game modes in fast-paced PvP matches!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 (64 bit), Windows 7 (32 & 64 bit), Windows Vista (32 & 64 bit) Processor: AMD Athlon 64 3200+ / Intel Pentium 4 3200+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6100 or compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard Sound Additional Notes: .net Framework 2.0 or higher
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 (64 bit), Windows 7 (32 & 64 bit), Windows Vista (32 & 64 bit) Processor: AMD Athlon II X2 255 / Intel Pentium E5500 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 3850 / NVIDIA GeForce 6800 GT DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard Sound Additional Notes: .net Framework 2.0 or higher

It's pretty fun honestly. The one thing that really really needs to be fixed is how much the weapons and gear cost. That, AND they have a 'rent' system whre you get a gun or piece of kit from 1-7 days. I suppose it's nice to be able to try things out before you spend the in game points you spent a bunch of time getting on them, but seriously the prices are a bit too much.

I frickin LOVE this game, cause its a sandbox game- like Garry's mod 'i love garrys mod'-Garry :D. And its an FPS game Like Blockade 3D so i F U C KING LOVE IT. 2 of my favorite games combined and you get Brick-Force! Its like if COD (Call Of Duty) and Minecraft had a baby.

WELL, my account was godly when steam didnt kick into brick force, I lost all my progress, but hey im not mad, just dissappointed, wont kill me to restart the past months playing this game. This game has many memories with me and friends, nothing to hate about in my opinion.

Edit: Well, I'm past Level 15, so I have to play on Medium servers or higher, and Mediums are empty, which means now I'm playing only Veterans decked out in bought gear. Game is completely unplayable now, 0 stars. It's too bad, this game could be great if they didn't completely ruin it.

this game is meh, just meh, BUT there is more to this game.  -WEAPONS- there IS alot of good weapons, like the tarantula-41 (ppsh-41) and there is the basic weapons, which I might recommend investing in weapon gems, because hey, i know the basic weapons might be bad, but try to upgrade them. -ARMOR AND GEAR- so, let's get armored. so YOU can get swat armor, basic armor as well. AND there is ammo pouches, and cosmetics like canteens, backpacks, and also some more stuff. -PLAYERS AND PLAYERBASE- there is ALOT kids who play this game, well some do anyway, but i am 14, and i play this game AND i am really good, good that some kids might call hax on me, but i don't hack, ever. and i get there might be SOME hackers, but seriously, no one likes hackers, especially in call of duty. -THINGS THAT COULD BE IN THE GAME- Fairfight-an anti cheat that can show the name of the hacker banned on your screen.  No p2w elements-seriously, THIS is why people hate this game so bad, because brick-force is p2w. i suggest keeping the force points AND remove the tokens, seriously, the game needs more positives, but no trolls, definately no trolls, and i'm sorry if i typed definately wrong. More Force Points and Experience (XP)-another thing people hate, people hate the low force point and experience rates. i suggest more FP and XP be gained through matches. Unlock system-wish you can unlock stuff? well, warface has that, rainbow six vegas 2 also has that, call of duty as well. BUT, brick force should get that system, IMAGINE, how much greater would it be to unlock something PERMANENTLY. yes, that is PERFECT! if the devs were nice enough to do that, anyways.  all i have to say is: this game is ok. i think the devs should put the nice features in this game, hopefully. so i think this game should better, well, ANYONE could like these features i talked about. so, here is my end review. 8/10 ok game, needs no p2w features, and most importantly, NO HATERS, seriously, none.

It's one of 'those' games. Since i barely had an expericne , i'm just going to make a pro and con list.  Pros -shooting works  Cons -takes forever to start up and close down -very few servers  -pay to win. Since the good weapons that do high damage cost 'tokens' -poorly made interface -very slow paced gameplay -bootleg soundtracks (Maple story, etc) -mentally undeveloped children as community -no objectives other than Build, TDM and Zombie Mode -no character customisation if you don't want to spend money -no rewards for winning or killing enemies -no fun  An unentertaining waste of time. Don't even bother checking it out.
Well heres a pros/cons for ya.   PROS +Easy to master  CONS -Too childish -Graphics are terrible -P2W -Renting weapons -Bad Grammer  Overall 1.5/10

Let me make this simple...  I absolutely LOVED this game the first time I tried it, so naturally, I tried it again the next day. It crashed. And crashed the next day. And the next day. And the next day... And the next day....    Have I ever told you the definition of insanity?

This game involves 8 year olds screaming in the chat about why they love this game and if you point out any flaws to them they litterally go ♥♥♥♥ing insane. Legit Conversation With a kid named Bob The Builder ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 'OMG THIS GAME IS SO GOOD! HOW ARE YOU COMPLAINING TECHYPANDA!?!?!' - Bob 'You can see the obvious flaws in this game yeh?, Im suprised steam let a game on their store like this. Its pay to win.' - Me '♥♥♥ Off, It's not pay to win it requires skill!' - Bob *Sneaks behind the 'MLG Pro' and whacks continously until he dies* 'M8 See it takes no skill I just killed you.' - Me 'YOU HACK, I'M REPORTING YOU!' - Bob '.-. Are you serious right now?, You also realise this game is clunky and the lowest I can get my razer chroma's sensitivity in this game is still like playing CS:GO with a Duck instead of a mouse.' - Me 'WHAT ARE YOU ON IM PLAYING FINE WITH MY LOGITECH MOUSE!' - Bob 'Can you tell me how to fix a razer on this game because its set to the lowest setting and its still way to fast to aim a shotgun...' - Me 'Nup!' - Bob *Bob Immediatly leaves server* '♥♥♥♥ This ♥♥♥♥♥♥ Piece of crap, whoever ♥♥♥♥ing buys the DLC for this ♥♥♥♥♥♥ game much be ♥♥♥♥ing ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥, go buy csgo for like 20 dollars because its Pay Once play forever, this crap is Pay Always Win Always.' - Me *I leave and uninstall the game then go back to playing CS:GO* -Valve, Remove this ♥♥♥♥♥♥ piece of crap game. This is a disgrace.

The First time i played i noticed the mouse movement was laggy, after a few minutes, it crashed out of nowhere. does not run very 'smoothly' at all. Don't see very much at all that's fun about this game. It seems to be aimed towards young children, as it is very clear that the guns, are not real guns, from the orange or green colored tip, shoot what seems to be paintballs, however the guns themselves do not look like a paintball gun. It seems to be trying to be a combo of Minecraft and call of duty, but does it very poorly. There is no Singleplayer. There is barely any people playing this game, and just an awful game overall. Not a good copy of Minecraft, Not a good Copy of Call of duty. If they start making people for this game, then anyone who buys it is not very wise. Try This Game at your own risk.

If Minecraft and Call of Duty fornicated in a stagnant pool of microtransactions and the wet dreams of 10 year old MC/COD fans, you would get Brick-Force.   If that's your thing, download this game immediately.   Cons  -Microtransactions, hordes of them touching you, everywhere, and from all angles! -Pay 2 Win -Controls feel a little clunky. Kind of like how a decent game would feel if you were playing without thumbs. -Pay 2 Win -MC/COD cliche. Honestly, did we need any more of these? Eh, whatever..  Pros  +Uninstall button works flawlessly

While playing this game I was seriously contemplating suicide.  I drove to my local cliff and threw my $3000 computer off. I also jumped off afterwards to retrieve it, realizing that the computer is worth more than my life.  That is what this game does to me. I r8 8/8.

It was nice to see this game again. But the bad news is that I thought that the EU version on Steam would at least link my old account into it. I was dead wrong. So ONLY the new people on Brick-Force will play this on Steam, while veterans... HAVE to go and get the launcher on the website.  Still, I may agree with SOME negative reviews this was given to this game. A classic in my books to tell the truth. Musn't be TOO negative. If possible, maybe Steam players may have a chance to 'cross-play' WITH the veterans on the original one.

Brick-force,Were do i Even Start?  How about where all games start, the log-in  This game did not except my email or username,anything witha hypen is banned,Except the TITLE OF THE GAME HAS A HYPEN  second,my computer hates this game, never has this happened. My Anti-Malaware gave a (Are you sure?) before i downloaded this game.it even had this bootleg anti-virus called X VIRUS..or something,it scared the crap out of me because i thought this game was a trojan and i would lose my computer.Thats a bad sign developers!  and once i got to play, this game did not impress me  it automatically puts you into a tutorial. it shows your the controls and weapons (i will talk about those later) it also has building elements like (minecraft)........its not obvious that this game rips off minecraft infact IT IS A SELLING POINT.  and with some games adding creativity (Like terraria) this game is both TF2 (even if it says call of duty it is still TF2) and this game shares the same problems with Blockade 3D as in that you have to pick the right weapon or you lose, that or you just get points of idle players.  and i like FPS games like Unturned, murder miners and TF2. so i dont hate the style, (i think it is overused) but FPS's can still be fun.  ALSO PAY TO PLAY IS FEATURED, but i think all free games can get away with this, usually.   Never in my life as a gamer have i been more scared downloading a game. its bootleg anti-virus,wierd login, it reaks of thievery, its unexceptable to think after scaring me like that I would still give them money, i did not.   this game gets a 1/10, i do see some sort of game,but i hate all game there, Just play TF2,Unturned or Murder miners all are better games than this. and for the first time, i hate this game. ive done a lot of bad reviews for games, but those games tried. but this one, I HATE IT DONT DOWNLOAD IT

Just steer clear of this game at all costs! It force downloads dangerous files that contain viruses and I almost lost my computer to the dang thing. I ran Norton (a anti-virus program) after the game downloaded a virus that looked like some sort of protection program at first until it told me that IT SUCCESSFULLY CORRUPTED THE OPERATING SYSTEM! Norton thankfully found the virus before it could take full effect and it was labeled under 'High Threat' meaning I could have had my computer get fried on the spot if I didn't take action ASAP. I have deleted the game from my hard drive and I will NEVER download this again.

I'm sure no one cares about what i have to say for this game, because lets face it, it's not very good, so instead have a chocloate cake recipe!  For the cake 225g/8oz plain flour 350g/12½oz caster sugar 85g/3oz cocoa powder 1½ tsp baking powder 1½ tsp bicarbonate of soda 2 free-range eggs 250ml/9fl oz milk 125ml/4½fl oz vegetable oil 2 tsp vanilla extract 250ml/9fl oz boiling water  For the chocolate icing 200g/7oz plain chocolate 200ml/7fl oz double cream  Method  1.Preheat the oven to 180C/350F/Gas 4. Grease and line two 20cm/8in sandwich tins.   2.For the cake, place all of the cake ingredients, except the boiling water, into a large mixing bowl. Using a wooden spoon, or electric whisk, beat the mixture until smooth and well combined.    3.Add the boiling water to the mixture, a little at a time, until smooth. (The cake mixture will now be very liquid.)   4.Divide the cake batter between the sandwich tins and bake in the oven for 25-35 minutes, or until the top is firm to the touch and a skewer inserted into the centre of the cake comes out clean.   5.Remove the cakes from the oven and allow to cool completely, still in their tins, before icing.   6.For the chocolate icing, heat the chocolate and cream in a saucepan over a low heat until the chocolate melts. Remove the pan from the heat and whisk the mixture until smooth, glossy and thickened. Set aside to cool for 1-2 hours, or until thick enough to spread over the cake.   7.To assemble the cake, run a round-bladed knife around the inside of the cake tins to loosen the cakes. Carefully remove the cakes from the tins.   8.Spread a little chocolate icing over the top of one of the chocolate cakes, then carefully top with the other cake.   9.Transfer the cake to a serving plate and ice the cake all over with the chocolate icing, using a palette knife. I have to be honest, this game is terrible. The aiming is awful, it is completely pay to win as you have to rent the guns (with real money) to be able to use them in your favor, there is no way to unlock them by actually playing the game. The gameplay in general is just terrible, altough it seems like a small game that requires little processing power to play it, it plays horribly on my computer which is decently powerfull to say the least. Overall this game is not worth aquiring and should not deserve a place on Steam.

Honestly it was fun to play but I can't play it with my friend. This needs to be fixed so I can have some battles against my friend. And he need to fiddle around with his computer that isn't fun. Nor is the game it's self it's kinda boring. My final verdict 4/10 and also let me tell about the pros and some other cons  Pros:  -building maps or bases  - fun multiplayer  - has some enjoyment  Cons:  - sometimes boring  - Microtransactions  - unplayable for my friend  - boring some times  - difficult menu   Honestly I would say save your time on a different game if you can't play it but you can still play it it's just beware.
